articles.summary: TechCrunch: A comprehensive list of 2025 tech layoffs. A complete list of all the known layoffs in tech, from Big Tech to startups, broken down by month throughout 2025. Related tickers mentioned: AAPL, AMAT, AMZN, ANSS, MBLY, META, PLTK, RIVN, SNPS, ZBRA.
